titleStmt.title: The doctrine of self-posing, or, a Christians duty of putting cases of difficulty to himself Being the summe of some sermons preached at Upton upon Seavern, in the county of Worcester. By B. Baxter, late minister of the gospel there, but now removed.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Benjamin, Preacher of the Gospel.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Peter Parker, and are to be sold at his shop under Creed-Church near Aldgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Dr. Williams' Library.

place.placeName: his shop under Creed-Church near Aldgate
